trait.name: Explosive Death
text: When the ant is reduced to 0 hp, it explodes in a burst of acid. Each creature within 5 feet of the ant must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or take 5 (2d4) acid damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The ant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Acid Spit
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 20 60 ft., one target. 5 (2d4) acid damage and the target takes 1 acid damage at the start of its next turn unless the target immediately uses its reaction to wipe off the spit.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.
